The abrasion-resistant tape is suitable for sealing high-temperature lines and chambers, masking during plasma spraying and other applications demanding high tensile strength and temperature resistance.

name: 3M 389 Cloth Tape, 25 mm x 50 m, Black
description: The 3M 389 cloth adhesive tape is a versatile tape with very good adhesion to a wide variety of substrates. It offers good tear resistance and flexibility for use on uneven surfaces. The polyethylene-coated cloth tape is easy to handle and can be used in conjunction with moisture. The tightly woven tape allows for gentle masking on curves. It has very high shear holding power and good conformability. Possible uses include color coding of parts, general repairs, or bundling pipes, fabrics and more. Tape color (example in description): silver.

name: 3M 389 Cloth Tape, 38 mm x 50 m, Black

name: 3M ATG Adhesive Film 924EU, Transparent, 12 mm x 55 m, 0.05 mm
description: The transparent 3M ATG Adhesive Film 924 from adhesive series 400 provides high initial tack on most substrate surfaces such as metal, paint, most plastics, paper, cardboard, wood or glass. name: 3M 5453 PTFE glass fabric adhesive tape 50mm x 33m, 0.22mm, silicone
description: 3M 5451 and 5453 are PTFE-coated glass fabric adhesive tapes with a durable silicone adhesive. These tapes have very good sliding properties, excellent anti-stick effect and high thermal and mechanical resistance. Suitable for coating plastic film welding devices and as a sliding layer with high mechanical strength and non-stick surface.

name: 3M 5490 PTFE Extruded Film Adhesive Tape 12.7mm x 33m, 0.09mm, Silicone
description: 3M 5490 and 5491 are extruded Teflon (PTFE) film adhesive tapes with a high-heat resistant silicone adhesive, differing mainly in thickness. They offer excellent chemical resistance, a low coefficient of friction and good release properties. As the Teflon film is extruded, the tapes have an extremely smooth surface and do not curl when unwound.

name: 3M 5480 PTFE film adhesive tape 9mm x 33m, 0.10mm, silicone
description: 3M 5480 (and 5481) are Teflon (PTFE) film adhesive tapes with a high-temperature resistant silicone adhesive. They differ mainly in thickness. The tapes offer excellent chemical resistance, a low coefficient of friction and good release properties. Typical uses include coating rollers, rolls, conveyor belts, packaging, sealing and ironing devices. Not intended for consumer retail; designed for industrial/professional use.

name: 3M ATG Adhesive Film 926, Transparent, 6 mm x 33 m, 0.13 mm
description: The linerless adhesive film 3M 926 has very high adhesive strength, even on low-energy substrates (e.g. PE, PP). The 0.13 mm thick adhesive film is temperature resistant up to +150 °C (short-term +230 °C) and shows very good resistance to solvents and UV exposure. 3M 926 is particularly suitable, used with the 3M ATG 700 hand dispenser, for simple and efficient bonding of front panels, emblems, signs and scales. This product is designed, manufactured and packaged for sale to industrial and professional customers for use at the workplace; it is not intended for sale to or use by consumers.

name: 3M Aluminium Glass-Fabric Tape, 363, Silver, 19 mm x 33 m
description: Laminated with an aluminum foil, this 3M tape provides very good reflection of radiant heat and excellent tear resistance due to a glass-fabric carrier. The carrier is glass fabric laminated with aluminum; the adhesive is a synthetic rubber (solvent-free) providing good shear resistance, initial tack and strength on cartons. Long-term reliable performance in extreme temperature ranges. Combination of glass fabric and aluminum enables good formability with extreme tear resistance. Temperature resistant up to 1,000 °C for pure radiant heat. Typical applications: high-temperature environments, uneven surfaces, shielding and bundling cable harnesses. Product intended for industrial and professional customers.
material: Glass fabric laminated with aluminum foil
backing: Glass-fabric carrier with aluminum foil laminate

name: 3M 5490 PTFE extruded film adhesive tape 19 mm x 33 m, 0.09 mm, silicone adhesive
description: 3M 5490 and 5491 are extruded Teflon (PTFE) film adhesive tapes with high temperature resistant silicone adhesive, differing mainly in thickness. They offer excellent chemical resistance, low coefficient of friction and good release properties. The extruded film provides an extremely smooth surface and resists rolling-up when unwound.

name: 3M All-Purpose Tape DT8, Black, 48 mm x 23 m, 0.2 mm
description: This aggressive tape consists of a polyethylene film laminated over cloth scrim with a synthetic/natural rubber adhesive. It resists fraying, tears cleanly from the roll, offers high immediate tack and conforms well to contoured surfaces. Suitable for a variety of demanding industrial applications. Available in black and silver.

name: 3M All-Purpose Tape DT8, Black, 48 mm x 55 m, 0.2 mm
description: This aggressive tape consists of a polyethylene film laminated to cloth with a synthetic/natural rubber adhesive. It resists wrinkling and tears cleanly from the roll. DT8 provides high immediate tack and conformability, ideal for contoured surfaces. Available in black and silver. Adheres well to plastic, glass and sealed concrete.
_check: Price assumed as for the 55 m roll; site shows 12,88 € (possible per-roll pricing). Other fields extracted from visible content.

name: 3M 5423 UHMW Polyethylene Sliding Adhesive Tape 12mm x 16.5m, 0.28mm, Rubber/Resin
description: 3M UHMW (ultra-high-molecular-weight) polyethylene sliding adhesive tapes have a very low coefficient of friction and a highly sliding surface combined with excellent abrasion resistance. They are self-lubricating, resistant to moisture and many chemicals, repellent to most dry or pasty substances, and have good puncture and impact resistance. Available in different thicknesses and adhesive formulations, suitable as sliding tape and for die-cut parts.

name: 3M 389 Cloth Tape, 50 mm x 50 m, white
description: The 3M 389 cloth adhesive tape is a versatile cloth tape with very good adhesion to a wide range of substrates. It offers good tear resistance and flexibility for use on uneven surfaces. The polyethylene-coated cloth tape is easy to handle and can be used in damp conditions. Its tight weave allows light masking around curves. High long-term holding power and good conformability. Typical uses: color-coding parts, general repairs, bundling pipes and fabrics.
_check: Description mentions silver in source while page variant is white; otherwise data extracted from visible content.

name: 3M 5423 UHMW Polyethylene Low-Friction Adhesive Tape 15 mm x 16.5 m, 0.28 mm, Rubber/Resin
description: 3M UHMW (ultra-high-molecular-weight) polyethylene low-friction adhesive tapes have a very low coefficient of friction and a highly slip-resistant surface combined with excellent abrasion resistance. This combination makes them especially suitable as glide tapes. They are self-lubricating, resistant to moisture and many chemicals, repel most dry or paste-like substances, and have good puncture and impact resistance. The 3M glide tapes are available in different thicknesses and adhesive types.

name: 3M 499 PVC Plaster Tape, yellow, 50 mm x 33 m
description: Scotch Plaster Tape 499 is ideal for protecting smooth and uneven surfaces during plastering, plaster works and facade renovation. Also suitable as formwork joint tape before concreting, for splicing and taping films, packaging, reinforcing or fastening. For sensitive surfaces, double application with Scotch Super Painter's Tape 244 underneath is recommended.

name: 3M 5401 Traction Tape 25mm x 33m
description: 3M Traction Tape 5401 is a single-sided, silicone-coated glass cloth adhesive tape. Typical applications include printing, paper manufacturing and other web-handling processes.
